title: I won my promo series but didn't get promoted?

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
Hello I just won my promo series to silver 1, I will post a link to my match history but basically I won the first game as Caitlyn, lost the second with vayne then won the 3rd game with Caitlyn. However it still says that I'm still silver 2 100lp with no games played in my series, which I initially thought was just a bug and it hasn't updated yet, but it's been a few hours now and I'm a bit concerned. Should I be worried about this? What can I do about it?

-Thanks (:

replies.body:
Hey there,

According to op.gg you're still currently in your series with 1 game left to complete.
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=cherub
